UCSCXenaTools 1.2.10

    • UCSCXenaTools: an R package for Accessing Genomics Data from UCSC Xena platform, from Cancer Multi-omics to Single-cell RNA-seq
  • Changelog

Xena Hub Information

Source: R/data.R
XenaData.Rd

This data.frame is very useful for selecting datasets fastly and independent on APIs of UCSC Xena Hubs.

Format

A tibble.

Source

Generated from UCSC Xena Data Hubs.

Examples

data(XenaData)
str(XenaData)
#> Classes ‘tbl_df’, ‘tbl’ and 'data.frame':	1589 obs. of  17 variables:
#>  $ XenaHosts       : chr  "https://ucscpublic.xenahubs.net" "https://ucscpublic.xenahubs.net" "https://ucscpublic.xenahubs.net" "https://ucscpublic.xenahubs.net" ...
#>  $ XenaHostNames   : chr  "publicHub" "publicHub" "publicHub" "publicHub" ...
